about_the_game:
❊ Summary ❊

Erotic events are coming to the righteous knight!

The son of the lord, a righteous knight George brought his three servants

to a village that was being ravaged by a Dungeon.

However, the Dungeon only accepts the entrance of at the same time.

Having made up his mind, George decided to enter the Dungeon with one of his servants,

but what lies ahead are countless erotic encounters...!?

Seduced by a servant or stepped into a trap...

George will encounter various situations in the dungeon.

He may even encounter situations where he has to have sex with enemies...!?

❊ Features ❊

▼Story▼

This is a story full of myth and conspiracy

that revolves around the Dungeon that appears in a border village.

Knight George and his three servants will come across powerful enemies.

 

▼Exploration▼

The exploration of the Dungeons is executed by simple commands.

In the respective Dungeon of the three servants,

a variety of events are waiting for you to discover.

 

▼Combat▼

Monsters occupy the Dungeons.

Utilize each servant's unique skillset and win the battles.

The servants all have multiple armor break presentations.

 

▼Base▼

Weapon shop, potion shop, tavern, and inn.

In your base, Jelba Village, villagers with rich personalities are waiting for your visit.

 

▼Characters▼

Knights, Warrior, Dancer, Priest.

And the Dark Knight and their servants.

About 20 characters with illustration are featured.

 

▼H▼

When exploring the Dungeon, sometimes you can't help but have sex with the servants...

 

❊ Summary of Featuring Characters❊

▼The Knight, George▼

The protagonist.

To save the border village, he decided to challenge the Dungeons with his servants.

He doesn't know his way around females and is a virgin at the start of the story.
 

▼The Warrior, Amelia▼

A loyal servant of George.

An emotionless icy beauty. She is stronger than George.

She hopes to teach George more about how to deal with females.
 

▼Dancer Maya▼

A traveling dancer.

She was saved by George when she was picked up by gangsters in town. She has been following them since.

She is open about sex.
 

▼Priest Gragina▼

A priest on her pilgrimage.

She met George and others when she was ambushed by bandits and joined them ever since.

She has a serious personality.
 

❊ Game Content❊

In this RPG game, you play as a righteous knight and explore the Dungeons with your servants.

During the isolated exploration, many erotic events await the knight.

“A sudden sex during the adventure,”

“Have sex with trusty comrades,”

are the themes of the erotic events.

Many erotic events are built around these two focal points.

The exploration of the Dungeons is executed by simple commands.

There are over 60 basic CGs and over 50 events,

and the estimated playtime is about 20 hours

The trial version contains the prologue.

Please ensure the game works on your system environment before buying the game.

content_descriptors.notes: This work contains sexual assault, interspecies sex, consensual/non-consensual sex and genital nudity and is not intended for all ages. All characters in the play are over the age of 20.

name: Knight and the three servants

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Knight George brought his three servants to a village that was being ravaged by a Dungeon. However, the Dungeon only accepts the entrance of “A man and a woman” at the same time. George decided to enter the Dungeon with one of his servants, but what lies ahead are countless erotic encounters...!?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
